Before pressure is applied, whilst the tank is at its normal working liquid level, a suitable measuring reference point, attached rigidly to the test room structure or floor, independent of the transformer shall be established as close as possible to the point on the tank where the maximum deflection under pressure is expected, taking into account the expected deflection.

Interpretation of oscillograms or digital recordings is based on comparison of the waveshapes of voltages and current records <t0/>between reduced and rated test voltages or between successive records at rated test voltage.
波形圖或數位記錄之解析係根據降低和額定測試電壓之間的電壓和電流波形比較，或於額定測試電壓下之前後測試比較。

Introduction
簡介
Investigation as to whether the indications are truly correlated to the test sequence or just represent coincident, irrelevant sources.
調查現象是否真正與測試程序相關或僅為巧合、不相關來源。
Investigation as to whether the partial discharge may be transmitted from the supply source.
調查局部放電是否由電源所產生。
Investigation by acoustic or ultrasonic detection of the location of the source(s) within the tank.
使用音波或超音波偵測油槽內之放電源位置。
Investigation of the location and nature of the source using ultra high frequency electromagnetic sensors introduced into the tank.
使用安裝於油槽中之超高頻電磁感測器找出放電源之位置和其特性。
Investigation of the probable location of the source(s) in terms of the electrical circuit diagram of the transformer, for example single phase and applied voltage tests may be useful.
調查變壓器電路圖中放電源所在可能位置，例如單相與施加電壓測試可能有幫助。

Investigation to determine whether the partial discharge source is within the transformer or outside (spitting from objects at floating potential in the hall, from live parts in air, or from sharp edges on earthed parts of the transformer).
調查以測定局部放電源來自變壓器內部或外部 (於浮動電壓下分離出來自霍爾電壓、活動零件、或變壓器接地零件之尖銳邊緣)。

為了維持標準變異 ≤3 dB，ΔL 之最大允許值為 dB(A)。

Many large cities of the developing world now appear comparable <t2/>to cities in developed countries as far as carbon emissions and resource consumption are concerned -- so far, there is no clear evidence that the impacts of urbanization on consumption patterns are going to be substantially different in newly urbanizing co<t3/>untries from what they are in OECD countries.

Many “business-as-usual” (BAU) scenarios have explored the potential consequences of the world’s continuing its dominant development model.<t1/> Most recent scenarios of this type are “dynamics-as-usual” (DAU) scenarios that assume across the board incremental improvements in technologies, for example for energy efficiency, following past dynamics.
許多 "基線" (BAU) 方案已探討了世界持續以其主導之發展模式的潛在後果，此類型之最新方案為假設科技不斷進步之 "動態線" (DAU) 方案，例如能源效率跟隨以往之動態。
Many “green” scenarios are unsustainable in at least one or more dimensions.
許多 "綠化" 方案無法於至少一個或多個維度中持續。

Monitoring temperature reduces heating costs by preventing billet overheating and reduces machine and die maintenance by identifying under heated billets before working.
溫度監測能避免鋼胚過熱以降低加熱成本並能在加工前發現過冷鋼胚以減少機台和模具維護。
Monitoring temperatures of iron ore, lime, coal and coke insures that the basic raw materials have achieved the right characteristics and prevents critical conveyor belts from being damaged.
監測鐵礦砂、石灰、煤炭和焦炭溫度以確保基本原料達到正確的特性並防止輸送帶嚴重損壞。
Monitoring the billet temperature in pipe mills allows the operator to adjust rollers, which results in reduced process downtime.
監測軋管機內的鋼胚溫度使操作人員能調整輥子以減少加工停機時間。

Particle Image Velocimetry (PIV)
質點影像測速 (PIV)

Particle Image Velocimetry (PIV) is whole-flow-field technique providing instantaneous velocity vector measurement in a cross-section of a flow (Landreth and Adrian, 1988; Adrian, 1991; Lecordier and Mouqallid, 1994; Rees, 2001; Rhoály et al., 2002).
質點影像測速 (PIV) 為可量測流體截面的暫態速度向量之全流場技術 (Landreth 和 Adrian， 1988 年；Adrian， 1991 年；Lecordier 和 Mouqallid， 1994 年；Rees， 2001 年；Rhoály 等人，2002 年)。

SAVE-SORB is composed of fine screened sphagnum peat moss, carefully selected, in which its chemical and physical characteristics allow a very high capacity of moisture retention (or absorption) such as: fuel, hydrocarbons solvents and the majority of chemical liquid products.
SAVE-SORB 視由精挑細選的細篩泥炭蘚所構成，其化學和物理性質可保持相當大的含水量 (或吸收量)，像是：燃料、烴類溶劑以及多數的化學液體產品。

圖 8(a) 之等溫線圖顯示出壓縮腔體中由於壓縮過程使核心溫度達到 330.0 K，
The temperature correction procedure is detailed in Annex E.
詳細溫度校正程序請參閱附錄 E。
The temperature is critical to insure proper bonding and color.
溫度為塗料黏合及色彩良好的關鍵。
The temperature of cooling air at the inlet to the cooling equipment not exceeding: 40 °C at any time;
冷卻設備入口之冷卻空氣溫度不超過： 40 ° C 任何時間；
The temperature of the cartridge must be at least t4 - 41 °F (5°C►.
卡匣溫度必須高於 Q = 41 °F (5°C)。
The temperature of the concrete must be at least 50 °F (10°C) and at most 104°F (40°C► (see Table IV).
水泥溫度必須高於 50 °F (10°C) 且低於 104°F (40°C) (見表 IV)。
The temperature of the insulation system shall not be les<t0/>s than 10 °C during the tests, but temperatures higher than those given in IEC 60076-1 may be used.
測試中絕緣系統之溫度不應低於 10 °C，應符合 IEC 60076-1 所列之溫度值。
The temperature of the insulation system shall not be less than 10 °C during the tests, but temperatures higher than those given in IEC 60076-1 may be used.
測試中絕緣系統之溫度不應低於 10 °C，應符合 IEC 60076-1 所列之溫度值。
The temperature of the winding<t0/> at the end of the temperature rise test is normally determined by the measurement of the winding resistance, according to 7.7.
溫度上升測試結束時之繞組溫度通常根據 7.7 量測繞組電阻而測定。
The temperature on the lateral wall of the displacer cylinder<t0/> <t1/>(the wall of regenerative channel) is assumed to maintain at a fixed<t2/> <t3/>linear profile as:

The temperature rise limits given in Table 1 are applied unless otherwise specified by the purchaser.
除買方另行指定外其適用表 1 給定之溫度上升限制。

The temperature rise limits given in Table 1 are valid for transformers with solid insulation designated as class 105 °C according to IEC 60085, and immersed in mineral oil or synthetic liquid <t0/>with a fire point <t1/>not above 300 °C (first code letter: O).
表 1 給定之溫度上升限制適用於具有固體絕緣符合 IEC 60085 之 105 °C 等級之變壓器，且浸入燃點不超過 300 °C 之礦物油或合成油 (代碼第一個字母為：O)。
The temperature rise of the liquid inside the windings of the transformer is assumed to increase linearly with the height of the windings.
假設變壓器繞組內部之液體溫度上升隨繞組高度線性增加。
The temperature rise value for an individual winding above liquid shall be obtained with rated current in the winding.
獨立繞組之液體溫度上升應於繞組使用額定電流時測定。
The temperature shall be measured at the intake of the cooling equipment.
應量測冷卻設備入口處之溫度，
The temperature-rise limits are valid for all <t5/>tappings<t6/>, at the appropriate tapping power, tapping voltage and tapping current.
溫度上升測試於適當抽頭功率抽頭電壓以及抽頭電流下適用於所有抽頭。
The temperature-rise limits are valid for all tappings, at the appropriate tapping power, tapping voltage and tapping current.
溫度上升測試於適當抽頭功率抽頭電壓以及抽頭電流下適用於所有抽頭。
The temperature-rise type test shall be carried out on one tapping only, unless otherwise specified.
除另有規定外，溫度上升試驗僅於一組抽頭上測試。
The temperature<t0/> rise of the liquid at the entry of the windings (bottom liquid temperature) can be determined as indicated for natural liquid flow cooling methods.
繞組入口之液體溫度上升 (底層液體溫度) 可使用與自然對流冷卻相同之方法測定。
The test allows the line terminals of a transformer with non-uniform insulation to be tested at the applied voltage test level applicable to the line terminals.
測試允許具有非統一絕緣變壓器之線路端子以其適用施加電壓等級進行測試。
The test also verifies the withstand str<t1/>ength between phases and along the winding(s) under test.
測試同時驗證各相之間及測試中繞組之突波耐壓強度。
The test also verifies the withstand strength between phases and along the winding(s) under test.
測試同時驗證各相之間及測試中繞組之突波耐壓強度。
The test basis for -all characteristics other than insulation is the rated condition, unless the test clause states otherwise.
除絕緣測試外的所有特性之測試皆於額定條件下進行。
The test can only be considered valid if the measured background PD level does not exceed 50 pC at both the beginning and the end of the test.
僅於測試開始和結束時之背景局部放電等級不超過 50 pC 的情況下，測試方為有效。
The test contains high frequency voltage components and produces non-uniform stresses in the winding under test different to those for an alternating voltage test.
測試包含高頻電壓項，並於繞組中製造與變電壓測試不同之不均勻應力。
The test criteria shall be as given in 13.2.2.2 for transformers without a non-linear element am
無非線性元件之變壓器測試標準如 13.2.2.2 所示，而具有非線性元件之變壓器測試標準如 13.2.3.2 所示。
The test current per phase 3 —/ shall be stated in the test report.
應於測試報告中說明每相測試電流 I/3。

The test current will be above rated current to the extent necessary for producing an additional amount of <t3/>loss equal to the no-load loss at rated voltage, and the winding temperature rise will be correspondingly elevated.
測試電流將高於額定電流以產生等同於額定電壓下之空載損耗的額外損耗，且繞組溫度上升將相對提高。
The test environment shall ideally provide a measurement surface which lies inside a sound field essentially undisturbed by reflections <t0/>from nearby objects and the environment boundaries.
理想測試環境中位於聲場內之量測表面必須不受附近物體及環境邊界反射干擾，
The test environment shall ideally provide a measurement<t0/> surface which lies inside a sound field, essentially undisturbed by reflections from nearby objects and the environment boundaries.
理想測試環境中位於聲場內之量測表面必須不受附近物體及環境邊界反射干擾，
The test equipment used in lightning and switching impulse applications is basically the same.
雷擊突波和開關突波應用之測試設備基本上相同，
The test impulse shall be a full standard lightning impulse: 1,2 ± 30 % V 50 ps ± 20 %..
測試突波應為標準全雷擊突波： 1,2 ± 30 % V 50 µs ± 20 %。
The test is combined with the full impulse test in a single sequence.
測試結合全突波測試於單一程序，

The test is intended <t0/>to verify the alternating voltage withstand strength of each line terminal and its connected winding(s) to earth and other windings, along the winding(s) under test and the withstand strength between phases.
測試目的為驗證各線路端子及其連接繞組至接地及其它繞組、測試中繞組、及各相之間之切換電壓耐壓強度。
The test is intended to verify the alternating voltage (AC) withstand strength of each line terminal to earth.
測試目的為驗證各線路端子至接地之切換電壓 (交流) 耐壓強度。

The test is intended to verify the alternating voltage withstand strength of each line terminal and its connected winding(s) to earth and other windings, along the winding(s) under test and the withstand strength between phases.
測試目的為驗證各線路端子及其連接繞組至接地及其它繞組、測試中繞組、及各相之間之切換電壓耐壓強度。
The test is intended to verify the alternating voltage withstand strength of the line and neutral terminals and their connected windings to earth and other windings.
測試目的為驗證線路端子和中性端子以及其連接繞組至接地和其它繞組之切換電壓耐壓強度。
The test is intended to verify the capability of the transformer to withstand fast rise time transients in service typically associated with lightning strikes.
此測試目的為驗證變壓器運轉中承受快速上升時間瞬變之能力，通常由雷擊造成。
The test is intended to verify the capability of the transformer to withstand slow rise time t<t0/>ransient voltages typically associated with switching operations in service.
此測試目的為驗證變壓器運轉中承受慢速上升時間瞬變之能力，通常由運轉中開關操作造成。
The test is intended to verify the capability of the transformer to withstand slow rise time transient voltages typically associated with switching operations in service.
此測試目的為驗證變壓器運轉中承受慢速上升時間瞬變之能力，通常由運轉中開關操作造成。
The test is intended to verify the impulse withstand voltage of the neutral terminal and it's connected winding(s) to earth and other windings, and along the winding(s) under test.
測試為驗證中性端子及其連接繞組至接地及其它繞組、及測試中繞組之突波耐壓。
The test is intended to verify the impulse withstand voltage of the neutral terminal<t0/> and it's connected winding(s) to earth and other windings, and along the winding(s) under test.
測試為驗證中性端子及其連接繞組至接地及其它繞組、及測試中繞組之突波耐壓。

The test is only <t0/>applicable to some special types of transformer with either a series winding that may be shorted in service (for example some phase shifting transformers with an on-load bypass) or where impulses on two or more terminals may occur simultaneously in service.
此向測試僅適用於某些串聯繞組可能於運轉中短路 (例如某些具負載旁通之相位移變壓器) 或當運轉中突波可能同時發生於兩個以上端子時之特殊類型變壓器。

The test is only <t1/>applicable to some special types of transformer with either a series winding that may be shorted in service (<t2/>for example some phase shifting transformers with an on-load bypass) or where impulses on two or more terminals may occur simultaneously in service.
此向測試僅適用於某些串聯繞組可能於運轉中短路 (例如某些具負載旁通之相位移變壓器) 或當運轉中突波可能同時發生於兩個以上端子時之特殊類型變壓器。
The test is passed if no voltage collapse or other sign of breakdown occurs.
若無電壓崩潰或其它故障發生則通過測試。
The test is performed with a three phase voltage on three phase transformers.
使用三相電壓於三相變壓器上進行測試。
The test is performed with the transformer conne<t1/>cted as for service.
測試之變壓器依運轉條件連接。
The test is performed with the transformer connected as for service.
測試之變壓器依運轉條件連接。
The test is successful if all the following criteria are fulfilled:
若測試滿足以下標準則視為合格：
The test is successful if no collapse of the test voltage occurs.
若無電壓崩潰發生則通過測試。

The test is successful if there are no significant differences between voltage and curren' transients recorded from the reference reduced level full impulse and those recorded at the ful test voltage including the chopped impulses up to the time of chop.
若參考之降低電壓全突波和包含截波之全測試電壓之間的電壓和電流暫態無顯著差異則通過測試。
The test is successful if there are no significant differences between voltage and current transients recorded from the lowest voltage reference impulse and those recorded at the ful test voltage.
若參考突波和全測試電壓之電壓和電流暫態無顯著差異則通過測試。

The test is successful if there are no significant differences between voltage and current transients recorded from the lowest voltage reference impulse and those recorded at the full test voltage including the chopped wave impulses up to the time of chop.
若最低電壓參考突波和包含截波之全測試電壓之間的電壓和電流暫態無顯著差異則通過測試。
The test is successful if there are no significant differences between voltage and current transients recorded from the reference impulse and those recorded at the full test voltage.
若參考突波和全測試電壓之電壓和電流暫態無顯著差異則通過測試。

The test is successful if there is no significant difference between the compared record; (beyond that which can reasonably be explained by small differences in the test voltage) am any changes between successive records are progressive and smooth, consistent with thi proper operation of the non-linear element.
正常操作非線性元件的條件下，若比較記錄後無顯著差異 (小幅差異可能因測試電壓差異造成)、以及前後記錄之間皆吻合、平穩且一致則通過測試。

The test is successful if there is no significant difference between the compared records (beyond that which can reasonably be explained by small differences in the test voltage) and any changes between successive records should be progressive and smooth, consistent with the proper operation of the non-iinear element.
正常操作非線性元件的條件下，若比較記錄後無顯著差異 (小幅差異可能因測試電壓差異造成)、以及前後記錄之間皆吻合、平穩且一致則通過測試。
The test is successful if there is no sudden collapse of voltage or discontinuity in the voltage or current indicated on the oscillographic records.
若無突發電壓崩潰發生或波形圖記錄中無不連續之電壓或電流則通過測試。
The test levels and details of the test arrangement shall be agreed.
測試電壓等級及詳細測試配置應由雙方協議。
The test object shall be <t0/>energized as agreed by the manufacturer and purchaser.
測試目標應由製造商和買方協定通電，
The test object shall be de-energized and the background noise pressure level measurements repeated.
應將測試目標斷電並重複進行背景噪音聲壓量測。
The test object shall be energized as agreed by the manufacturer and purchaser.
測試目標應由製造商和買方協定通電，
The test procedure is outlined in IEC 60076-3.
測試程序大綱列於 IEC 60076-3 之中，
The test sequence shall be as follows:
測試順序如下：
The test sequence shall be as given in <t0/>13.2.2.1 <t1/>for transformers without a non-linear elemen <t2/>and 13.2.3.1 <t3/>for transformers with a non-linear element.
無非線性元件之變壓器測試順序如 13.2.2.1 所示，而具有非線性元件之變壓器測試順序如 13.2.3.1 所示。
The test sequence shall consist of one reference impulse of a voltage between 50 % and 70 % of the full test voltage and three impulses at full voltage.
測試程序應包含一組電壓介於全測試電壓 50 % 至 70 % 之間的參考突波以及三組全電壓突波。
The test sequence shall consist of:
測試程序應包括：
The test shall be arranged so that the test voltage appears between the tested terminal and earth.
測試配置應使測試電壓施加於測試端子和接地之間，

The test shall be carried out at the manufacturer’s works, unless the transformer is to be installed on-site by the manufacturer in which case the test may be perform<t1/>ed on-site instead of in the factory.
應由製造商於工廠進行測試，除非製造商將於現場安裝變壓器時，可於現場進行測試。

The test shall be carried out at the manufacturer’s works, unless the transformer is to be installed on-site by the manufacturer in which case the test may be performed on-site instead of in the factory.
應由製造商於工廠進行測試，除非製造商將於現場安裝變壓器時，可於現場進行測試。
The test shall be carried out at the manufacturer’s works.
應由製造商於工廠進行測試，
The test shall be carried out on each phase in turn.
應輪流針對各相進行測試。
The test shall be carried out on each separate winding of the transformer in turn.
應針對變壓器每個單獨繞組輪流進行測試。
The test shall be carried out on the transformer when it is complete in all relevant respects and filled with liquid.
測試於變壓器組裝完成並填充液體後進行。
The test shall be carried out on the transformer when it is complete in all relevant respects and on all compartments that require vacuum to be applied on-site.
測試於變壓器組裝完成且所有現場所需之真空腔體皆安裝後進行。
The test shall be carried out with any accessible neutral terminals and any other terminals that
測試應於所有可連接之中性端子和其它所有運轉中接地之處進行。
The test shall be carried out with any accessible neutral terminals and any other terminals that are normally at earth potential in service earthed.
測試應於所有可連接之中性端子和其它所有運轉中接地之處進行。
The test shall be made with an approximately sinusoidal single-phase alternating voltage at not less than 80 % of the rated frequency.
測試應使用近似正弦波之單相交流電壓，且不得低於額定頻率的 80 %。

The test shall be made without the deliberate addition of impedance in the chopping circuit, but if the overswing observed during a reduced voltage application is more than 30 % then the minimum impedance required to bring the overswing below 30 % may be added to the chopping circuit.
測試應於不刻意增加截波電路阻抗的情況下進行，但使用降低電壓時若出現超過 30 % 的過度振盪時，則可加入最小的阻抗至截波電路中以使過度振盪低於 30 %。
The test shall be performed with the transformer excited exactly as it will be for service.
測試之變壓器依運轉條件連接。
The test shall commence at a voltage not greater than one-third of the specified test value, and the voltage shall be increased to the test value as rapidly as is consistent with measurement.
初始測試電壓不應超過指定測試值的三分之一，且電壓應盡可能迅速增加至測試值以符合量測。
The test time at full test voltage shall be 60 s for any test frequency up to and including twice the rated frequency, unless otherwise specified.
除另行指定外，所有測試頻率低於 (含) 兩倍額定頻率之全測試電壓時間應為 60 秒。

The test time at the enhancement voltage shall be 60 s in case <t0/>U<t1/>m<t2/> < 800 kV and 300 s in case <t3/>U<t4/>m<t5/> ><t6/> 800 kV for any test frequency up to and including twice the rated frequency, unless otherwise specified.
除另行指定外，所有測試頻率低於 (含) 兩倍額定頻率之加強電壓下之測試時間，當 <t0/>U<t1/>m<t2/> ≤ 800 kV 時為 60 秒，而當 <t3/>U<t4/>m<t5/> ><t6/> 800 kV 時為 300 秒。
The test time, frequency and voltage application shall be as given for the induced voltage withstand test see <t0/>11<t1/>.<t2/>2<t3/>.
測試時間、頻率及電壓應為感應電壓耐壓測試所列之數值，請見 11.2。
The test verifies the switching impulse withstand strength of the line terminals and the connected winding(s) to earth and other windings.
測試為驗證線路端子及其連接繞組至接地及其它繞組之開關突波耐壓強度。
The test verifies the withstand strength of the transformer under test, when the impulse is applied to its line terminals.
此項測試為變壓器於測試時施加突波至其線路端子以驗證其耐壓強度。
The test verifies the withstand strength of the transformer under test, when the impulse is applied to<t1/> its line terminals.
此項測試為變壓器於測試時施加突波至其線路端子以驗證其耐壓強度。
The test voltage C/<t0/>t<t1/> will be oscillatory or ex<t2/>ponential, depending on the value of the damping coefficient <t3/>k<t4/> of the circuit.
測試電壓 U<t0/>t<t1/> 取決於電路阻尼係數 <t3/>k<t4/> 將振盪或呈指數。
The test voltage i<t0/>s given in Table 2.
測試電壓列於表 2 中。
The test voltage is applied in the same way as the voltage that the transformer will experience in ser<t0/>vice.
測試電壓與變壓器操作電壓相同。
The test voltage is applied in the same way as the voltage that the transformer will experience in service.
測試電壓與變壓器操作電壓相同。
The test voltage is given in Table 2.
測試電壓列於表 2 中。
The test voltage is normally of negative polarity to reduce the risk of erratic external flashover in the test circuit.
測試電壓極性通常為負以降低測試電路中不穩定之外部跳火風險。
The test voltage shall be adjusted according to a voltmeter responsive to the mean value of voltage but scaled to read the <t0/>r.m.s<t1/>.
測試電壓應根據電壓表對平均電壓值之響應進行調整，但進行縮放以使正弦波之方均根電壓有相同的平均讀值。
The test voltage value shall be the test voltage value as defined in IEC 60060-1 (after the test voltage function is applied).
測試電壓應為 IEC 60060-1 中所定義之測試電壓值 (使用測試電壓函數後)。
The test voltage wave shape is satisfactory if the readings U' and U are equal within 3 %.
若 U' 和 U 之讀值差異小於 3 % 則測試電壓波形合格，
The test voltages contained in Table 2 have been established based on IEC 60071-1.
表 2 所列之測試電壓為依據 IEC 60071-1 所建立。
The tested sample does not show any changes in color / fading of the outer white coat.
測試後樣品外層白色塗層顏色無任何改變 / 褪色。
The testing environment should first be investigated to find any obvious sign of irrelevant sources of partial discharges.
應首先調查測試環境已找出任何局部放電之不相關來源的明顯跡象，
The testing of such transformers should remain quick and affordable.
此類變壓器之測試應能快速進行且成本低廉。
The tests prescribed for the internal insulation of the transformer do not automatically verify that the external insulation is satisfactory.
針對變壓器內部絕緣之測試並非直接使外部絕緣符合規範。

測試應依照以下順序進行：:

The time interval between the application of the last chopped wave and the first full wave aft< the chop waves shall be as short as practicable.
施加最後一截波後至第一個全波之間的時間應盡可能縮短。
The time taken to saturate the core is dependent on the core size, its initial state of magnetization and the level and waveshape of the applied voltage.
核心飽和所需時間取決於核心尺寸、其磁化初始狀態以及施加電壓波形。
The time to chopping is therefore not regarded as a test parameter provided that it is within the limits of 2 pus and 6 ps as required by IEC 60076-3.
因而截波時間不視為測試參數，其數值依 IEC 60076-3 之規範介於 2 µs 至 6 µs 之間的限制範圍內。
The time to first voltage zero after the instant of chopping shall be as short as possible.

The time to half-value <t0/>T<t1/>2<t2/> is, for lightning impulses, primarily determined by the generator capacitance, the inductance of the test object and the generator discharge resistance or any other para<t3/>llel resistance.
雷擊突波之半高值時間 <t0/>T<t1/>2<t2/> 主要由產生器電容、測試目標電感以及產生器放電電阻或其它並聯電阻所決定。
The time to peak is chosen to be long enough to give an essentially linear voltage distribution along the winding.
選擇足夠的達峰值之時間以於繞組中提供必要之線性變壓分佈。
The time to zero can be increased by inducing a remnant flux into the core of opposite direction to that induced during the test before each full-voltage test impulse.

The tolerance on the test voltage value is ± 3 %.
測試電壓值公差為 ± 3 %。

The torque motor leads are individually attached to a flying lead type explosion proof header so that external connections can provide series, parallel, or single coil operation.

The transformer manufacturer shall perform an agreed test to prove the transformer tank will not leak in service.
變壓器製造商應依協議進行測試以證明變壓器油槽不會於運轉中洩漏。
The transformer parameters which are involved in inductive surge transfer are better defined and less dependent on rate of rise (or frequency) than those involved in capacitive transfer.
變壓器與感應突波傳輸相關之參數應定義且應較電容性傳輸之參數不易受上升率 (或頻率) 影響。

The transformer shall be approximately at factory ambient temperature.
變壓器應大約處於工廠周圍溫度。

The transformer shall be capable, of carrying, in continuous service, the rated power (for a multi-winding transformer: the, specified combination(s) of winding rated power(s)) under conditions listed in Clause 4 and without exceeding the temperature-rise limitations specified in IEC 60076-2 for liquid immersed transformers.
變壓器應能在第 4 條款所列條件下連續供應額定功率 (多繞組變壓器：指明繞組額定功率組合) 而不超過 IEC 60076-2 液浸式變壓器中所規定之的溫度上升限制。

由於所有元件皆可能影響變壓器之介電強度，變壓器應完全組裝成運作設置。

The transformer shall be designed and manufactured to withstand a constant acceleration of at least 1 g in all directions (in addition to the acceleration due to gravity in the vertical direction) without any damage, demonstrated by static force calculations based on a constant value of acceleration.
變壓器的設計和製造應能承受至少所有方向 1 g (垂直方向需再加上重力加速度) 的恒定加速度不受損，於恒定加速度下以靜力計算驗證。

Unless otherwise specified, it shall be assumed that the range is symmetrical around the principal tapping and that the tapping steps in the tapped winding are equal.
除非另行指定，否則須假設其範圍為對稱主抽頭且抽頭繞組之抽頭級相等。

Unless otherwise specified, the maximum operating voltage is to be taken as being on any tapping and is an upper limit on the voltage on all windings simultaneously, for example a step down transformer with a +15 % LV tapping and a specified maximum operating voltage of +10 % of rated voltage will not be used at no load on that tapping at HV voltages exceeding —5 % of rated voltage, but on load, the tapping may be used at higher HV voltages to compensate for voltage drop in the transformer.
除另行指定外，最高操作電壓適用所有抽頭且同時為所有繞組電壓上限，例如降壓變壓器含 +15 % 低壓抽頭及指定最大操作電壓為額定電壓的 +10%，不用於空載時高電壓超出額定電壓的 -5%，而抽頭可能於負載時使用較高的高電壓以補償變壓器之電壓降，
Unless otherwise specified, the principal tapping applies.
若無特別說明，其短路阻抗代表主抽頭。
Unless otherwise specified, the principal tapping is located in the middle of the tapping range.
除非另外指定，否則主抽頭位於抽頭範圍中間。
Unless otherwise specified, the sound level shall be taken as the no load sound level with all cooling equipment required to achieve rated power in operation.
除非另外說明，否則音量等級為無負載運轉下並包含達額定功率操作所需之所有冷卻設備的音量等級。

fischer FIS EM ADHESIVE ANCHORING SYSTEM FOR CRACKED AND UNCRACKED CONCRETE
用於龜裂和無龜裂混凝土之 fischer FIS EM 黏結錨固系統

fischer FIS EM Adhesive Anchors are used to resist static, wind and earthquake (Seismic Design Categories A through F) tension and shear loads in cracked and uncracked normal-weight concrete having a specified compressive strength, <t0/>f′ <t1/>c<t2/>, of 2,500 psi to 8,500 psi <t3/>(17.2 MPa to 58.6 MPa).
fischer FIS EM 黏結錨固用於龜裂及無龜裂之一般重量混凝土以抵抗靜力、風以及地震 (抗震設計類別 A 至 F) 產生之張力及剪力負荷，其壓應力強度 <t0/>f′ <t1/>c<t2/> 介於 2,500 psi 至 8,500 psi <t3/>(17.2 MPa 至 58.6 MPa) 之間。

fischer FIS EM adhesive anchors are permitted to be installed in concrete that is cracked or that may be expected to crack during the service life of the anchor, subject to the conditions of this report.
根據本報告的條件，fischer FIS EM 黏合錨固可安裝在龜裂或預期在使用期間會龜裂之混凝土。
fischer FIS EM adhesive anchors are recognized for use to resist short- and long-term loads, including wind and earthquake loads, subject to the conditions of this report.
根據本報告的條件，fischer FIS EM 黏結錨固已公認可承受短時間和長時間的負荷，包括風力和地震負荷。

fischer FIS EM adhesive anchors must be installed in accordance with this report and the manufacturer’s printed installation instructions included in the adhesive packaging and described in Figure 4 of this report.
fischer FIS EM 黏結錨固系統必須遵照本報告、黏著劑包裝所附的製造商安裝說明以及本報告圖 4 之指示進行安裝。

fischer FIS EM adhesive is identified by packaging labeled with the manufacturer’s name (fischerwerke) and address, product name, lot number, expiration date, and the evaluation report number (ESR-1990).
fischer FIS EM 黏著劑包裝上標有製造商名稱 (fischerwerke)、地址、產品名稱、批號、有效期限以及評估報告編號 (ESR-1990)。
fischer FIS EM adhesive may only be used with continuously threaded steel rods or deformed steel reinforcing bars described in Tables 2, 3, and 4 of this report.
fischer FIS EM 黏著劑只能用於本報告之表 2、3 以及 4 中所述之連續螺紋鋼柱或變形之鋼筋柱強化。
fischer adhesive anchoring system FIS EM Fischer FIS EM is an epoxy adhesive anchoring system for fastenings in normal weight concrete.
fischer FIS EM 黏結錨固系統 FIS EM Fischer FIS EM 為用於固定一般重量混凝土之環氧樹脂黏著劑。

<t0/><t1/>Spill Kits
 洩漏處理工具組
<t0/><t1/>The largest alternative to clay is the poly pads.
 黏土最大宗的替代品為聚合物吸收墊。
<t0/><t1/>The vast majority of the absorbent market is made up of clay based products (kitty litter).
 市場上絕大多數吸收劑為黏土質產品 (貓砂)。
<t0/><t1/>We provide a multitude of specially designed spill kits to meet the needs of various industries.
 我們提供多種專門設計之洩漏處理工具組，以滿足各行各業的需求。
<t0/><t1/>We save the environment by providing a green product that doesn’t just pick up oil, but encapsulates it and locks it away until that oil can be broken down into safer elements.
 我們提供的環保產品不僅能吸附油污，也能封鎖住油污直到其分解成較安全的元素以保護環境。
<t0/><t1/>We save their money by providing a much more cost effective way to manager their spill and leak control.
 我們提供更具成本效益的洩漏控制管理方式為客戶節省金錢。
<t0/><t1/>We save their time by providing a product that outperforms every product currently on the market.
 我們提供目前市場上最佳的產品為客戶節省時間。

<t0/><t1/>Anchors that support gravity load–bearing structural elements are within a fire-resistive envelope or a fire-resistive membrane, are protected by approved fire-resistive materials, or have been evaluated for resistance to fire exposure in accordance with recognized standards.
